contents.text: Welcome to Ironclad, the San Francisco-based contract management platform.
For sales and new account inquiries, press '1'.
For product demos and free trials, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team for a product demo.

navigationGoals: I’d like a quick live demo of the AI-powered contract review tool.
Schedule a product demo to evaluate Ironclad for my veteran-led contracting firm.
I’d like to schedule a technical walkthrough of Ironclad’s API integration and feature workflows.
Could someone walk me through the software features in a live demo?
I’d like to schedule a walkthrough of Ironclad’s features so I can see how it fits my lab’s workflow.

contents.text: For pricing and licensing information, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales specialists for pricing and licensing information.

navigationGoals: I need a detailed quote for a 20-user enterprise license and any volume discounts.
Get detailed pricing and licensing information for using Ironclad in my nonprofit veteran outreach program.
I need detailed pricing on enterprise seat licenses, volume discounts, and licensing tiers.
I need help understanding the service pricing and available license options.
I need information on academic or student licensing rates for Ironclad before I make any recommendations.

contents.text: For customer support and service, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m getting an upload error when importing contracts and need technical help.
Troubleshoot a login issue and get technical support accessing my Ironclad account.
I’m encountering an OAuth token error when integrating Ironclad’s API and need troubleshooting assistance.
I’m having trouble using the platform and need technical support.
I’m getting an error when I try to upload my lab’s confidentiality agreement—can I get technical assistance?

contents.text: For contract administration and renewals, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with our contract services representative.

navigationGoals: I want to confirm and process my upcoming contract renewal and adjust our user count.
Renew and review the terms of my existing Ironclad contract.
I want to renew our annual subscription, amend contract terms, and add additional user seats.
I’d like to renew my contract and confirm the renewal fees.
I want to renew and update our existing contract management agreement for my department’s research projects.
